info.description: REST API for managing universities, departments, teams, proposals, and reviews.
info.title: University Project Hub API

get.description: Admin retrieves list of users with optional filters

post.description: Admin registers or approves a new student account
Admin registers or approves a new teacher account

get.description: Admin retrieves user details by ID

delete.description: Admin deletes a user account (use with caution)

post.description: Admin assigns a teacher or student to a department

patch.description: Admin controls user account activation status

get.description: Retrieve a list of all departments (optionally filtered by university)

post.description: Admin creates a new department under a university

get.description: Retrieve a specific department by its ID

delete.description: Admin deletes a department (use with caution)

post.description: Teacher reviews proposal and submits feedback (approve, revise, reject)

get.description: Teacher gets all proposals awaiting their review
Get all proposals (filtered by status, department)

parameters.description: Filter by status (draft, submitted, under_review, etc.)
parameters.name: status

post.description: Student creates a new proposal in draft state

get.description: Retrieve proposal details with versions and feedback

delete.description: Delete a proposal (only allowed for drafts)

get.description: Retrieve all feedback history for a specific proposal
get.summary: Get all feedback for a proposal

post.description: Team leader submits proposal, locks it, and notifies teacher

get.description: Retrieve version history for a proposal
get.summary: Get all versions of a proposal

post.description: Add a new version to a draft or revision-required proposal

get.description: Get all teams where the user is a member or creator

post.description: Student creates a new team and becomes the leader
Student accepts or rejects a team invitation
Team leader invites a student to join the team

get.description: Retrieve all members of a team

delete.description: Team leader removes a member from the team

get.description: Retrieve a list of all universities

post.description: Admin creates a new university with configuration settings

get.description: Retrieve a specific university by its ID

put.description: Admin updates university configuration (academic year, visibility, AI checker)

delete.description: Admin deletes a university (use with caution)
